class.name: vizzy_rviz_plugins/WasdTeleop
class.description: A panel widget allowing simple diff-drive style robot base control like a Gamer. W, S controls the linear velocity of the robots and pressing the Shift boosts this velocity. A, D controls the angular velocity. Q and E commands the angular velocity with boosted values.
